kpi_info.title: BTS HSUPA HW LIMITED DURATION
kpi_info.use: This counter indicates how long time the BTS local cell group HW pool where this cell belongs, is in HSUPA HW limited state during the measurement period. In this state RNC will setup E-DCH but the BTS HW shortage may cause lower than expected throughput.The same counter value is updated for all HSUPA enabled cells in the local cell group. At 1-second intervals with value 1 when BTS has reported with RADIO RESOURCE MEASUREMENT REPORT to be in HW limited state.
